## Faculty

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
faculty_table = yaml::read_yaml("people/faculty.yaml") %>% 
  do.call(rbind, .) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  tidyr::unnest() %>%
  tibble::as.tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(Picture = paste0("<a href='",
                                 url,
                                 "' target='_blank'>",
                                 "<img border = '0' src = '",
                                 picture,
                                 "' width = '250'></a>"),
                Name = paste0("<a href='",
                              url,
                              "' target='_blank'>",
                              name,
                              "</a>")) %>%
  dplyr::select(Picture, Name)
DT::datatable(faculty_table,
              escape = FALSE,
              options = list(dom = 't'),
              rownames = FALSE)
```
